title: ASL 1.9 — Numbers & Counting
objectives: Practice age, quantity, and counting people.
Integrate numbers into daily questions (HOW-MANY, HOW-OLD).

sections.caption: Instructor reviews numbers with handshape clarity.

sections.prompt: Sign your age, the number of siblings you have, and count objects around you.
Which numbers were hardest to sign quickly and clearly?

quiz.q: How do you ask 'How old are you?' in ASL?
What’s the hand orientation for numbers 6–9?

reflectionPrompt: Upload a short clip signing your age, how many siblings, and how many classes you take.
